src: "Abbiamo topi di quattro mesi che prima erano diabetici e ora non lo sono più", ha aggiunto.
mt: "We have four-month-old mice that were diabetic and are no longer diabetic," he added.
ref: "We now have 4-month-old mice that are non-diabetic that used to be diabetic," he added.

src: Lo studio è ancora in fase iniziale, come dichiarato cautelativamente dal dottor Ehud Ur, professore di medicina alla Dalhousie University di Halifax, Nuova Scozia, e direttore del dipartimento clinico e scientifico della Canadian Diabetes Association.
mt: The study is still in its early stages, as cautioned by Dr. Ehud Ur, professor of medicine at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia, and director of the clinical and scientific department of the Canadian Diabetes Association.
ref: Dr. Ehud Ur, professor of medicine at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia and chair of the clinical and scientific division of the Canadian Diabetes Association cautioned that the research is still in its early days.

src: Come altri esperti, è scettico circa la possibilità di curare il diabete, sottolineando che questi risultati non hanno rilevanza per chi è già affetto dal diabete di tipo 1.
mt: As other experts, he is skeptical about the possibility of curing diabetes, emphasizing that these results are not relevant for those who already have type 1 diabetes.
ref: Like some other experts, he is skeptical about whether diabetes can be cured, noting that these findings have no relevance to people who already have Type 1 diabetes.

src: La segretaria permanente del Comitato per il Nobel per la letteratura dell'Accademia svedese, Sara Danius, nel corso di un programma radiofonico andato in onda lunedì sulla radio svedese Sveriges Radio, ha annunciato pubblicamente che il Comitato ha rinunciato a contattare Bob Dylan, non riuscendo a raggiungerlo direttamente per comunicargli la vittoria del Nobel per la letteratura 2016.
mt: Sara Danius, the permanent secretary of the Swedish Academy's Nobel Committee for Literature, announced publicly on Monday during a radio program on Swedish Radio that the committee had given up trying to contact Bob Dylan, unable to reach him directly to inform him of his 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature.
ref: On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Nobel Committee for Literature at the Swedish Academy, publicly announced during a radio program on Sveriges Radio in Sweden the committee, unable to reach Bob Dylan directly about winning the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, had abandoned its efforts to reach him.

src: Danius ha dischiarato: "Ora come ora non stiamo facendo niente. Ho telefonato e inviato e-mail al suo più stretto collaboratore, che mi ha risposto in modo molto gentile. Per il momento, basta e avanza".
mt: Danius said: "Right now we're not doing anything. I've called and emailed his closest collaborator, who responded very politely. For now, that's enough."
ref: Danius said, "Right now we are doing nothing. I have called and sent emails to his closest collaborator and received very friendly replies. For now, that is certainly enough."

src: In precedenza, Jamie Siminoff, amministratore delegato di Ring, ha sottolineato che la società era nata quando ancora non poteva sentire il campanello dal suo negozio in garage.
mt: Previously, Jamie Siminoff, CEO of Ring, said the company was born when he couldn't hear the doorbell from his garage store.
ref: Previously, Ring's CEO, Jamie Siminoff, remarked the company started when his doorbell wasn't audible from his shop in his garage.

src: Ha detto di aver costruito un campanello Wi-Fi.
mt: He said he built a Wi-Fi doorbell.
ref: He built a WiFi door bell, he said.

src: Siminoff ha dichiarato che le vendite sono incrementate dopo la sua comparsa nel 2013 in un episodio di Shark Tank, in cui la giuria del programma si è rifiutata di finanziare la startup.
mt: Siminoff said sales have increased since his appearance on the show in 2013, when the Shark Tank panel rejected funding the startup.
ref: Siminoff said sales boosted after his 2013 appearance in a Shark Tank episode where the show panel declined funding the startup.

src: Siminoff è comparso sull'emittente televisiva commerciale QVC alla fine del 2017.
mt: Siminoff appeared on the shopping channel QVC at the end of 2017.
ref: In late 2017, Siminoff appeared on shopping television channel QVC.

src: Ring ha inoltre raggiunto un accordo transattivo con la società concorrente di servizi di sicurezza, la ADT Corporation.
mt: Ring also reached a settlement with its security services competitor, ADT Corporation.
ref: Ring also settled a lawsuit with competing security company, the ADT Corporation.

src: Se da un lato sembra che ci sia un vaccino sperimentale in grado di ridurre la mortalità da Ebola, dall'altro non è stato trovato ancora nessun farmaco che si sia chiaramente dimostrato adatto al trattamento dell'infezione esistente.
mt: While there is an experimental vaccine that appears to reduce mortality from Ebola, there is still no drug that has been clearly shown to be effective in treating the infection.
ref: While one experimental vaccine appears able to reduce Ebola mortality, up until now, no drugs have been clearly demonstrated suitable for treating existing infection.

src: Un cocktail di anticorpi, ZMapp, si è inizialmente mostrato promettente sul campo, ma studi formali hanno rivelato un'efficacia inferiore rispetto a quella sperata nella prevenzione dei decessi.
mt: A cocktail of antibodies, ZMapp, initially appeared promising in the field, but formal studies revealed an efficacy below that hoped for in preventing deaths.
ref: One antibody cocktail, ZMapp, initially showed promise in the field, but formal studies indicated it had less benefit than sought in preventing death.

src: Nello studio PALM, ZMapp è stato usato come mezzo di controllo, ovvero gli scienziati lo hanno impiegato come riferimento e messo a confronto con le altre tre terapie.
mt: In the PALM study, ZMapp was used as a control, meaning the scientists used it as a reference and compared it to the other three therapies.
ref: In the PALM trial, ZMapp served as a control, meaning scientists used it as a baseline and compared the three other treatments to it.

src: La USA Gymnastics appoggia la lettera del Comitato Olimpico degli Stati Uniti e riconosce l'assoluta necessità da parte della comunità olimpica di adoperarsi per creare un ambiente sicuro per tutti i suoi atleti.
mt: The USA Gymnastics supports the letter of the United States Olympic Committee and recognizes the absolute necessity of the Olympic community to take action to create a safe environment for all its athletes.
ref: USA Gymnastics supports the United States Olympic Committee's letter and accepts the absolute need of the Olympic family to promote a safe environment for all of our athletes.

src: Concordiamo con quanto affermato dall'USOC, ovvero che gli interessi dei nostri atleti e dei nostri club, e del loro sport, possono essere meglio serviti portando avanti un cambiamento significativo all'interno della nostra organizzazione, e non con la decertificazione.
mt: We agree with the USOC's statement that the best interests of our athletes and clubs, and their sport, can be better served by pursuing significant change within our organization, and not by decertification.
ref: We agree with the USOC's statement that the interests of our athletes and clubs, and their sport, may be better served by moving forward with meaningful change within our organization, rather than decertification.

src: La USA Gymnastics ha promosso un'indagine indipendente per capire come sia stato possibile che un abuso delle dimensioni descritte con tanto coraggio da chi è riuscito a sopravvivere a Larry Nassar sia rimasto nascosto per così tanto tempo, ed è disposta ad implementare qualunque cambiamento necessario o adeguato.
mt: The USA Gymnastics has promoted an independent investigation to understand how it was possible that an abuse of the described dimensions with so much courage from those who managed to survive Larry Nassar remained hidden for so long, and is willing to implement any necessary or appropriate change.
ref: USA Gymnastics supports an independent investigation that may shine light on how abuse of the proportion described so courageously by the survivors of Larry Nassar could have gone undetected for so long and embraces any necessary and appropriate changes.

src: USA Gymnastics e USOC hanno il medesimo obiettivo: rendere la ginnastica e gli altri sport il più sicuri possibile, affinché gli atleti possano inseguire i loro sogni in un ambiente affidabile, positivo e responsabilizzato.
mt: USA Gymnastics and USOC have the same goal: to make gymnastics and other sports as safe as possible, so that athletes can pursue their dreams in a reliable, positive, and responsible environment.
ref: USA Gymnastics and the USOC have the same goal — making the sport of gymnastics, and others, as safe as possible for athletes to follow their dreams in a safe, positive and empowered environment.

src: Nel corso degli anni '60, Brzezinski fu il consigliere di John F. Kennedy e successivamente dell'amministrazione Lyndon B. Johnson.
mt: In the 1960s, Brzezinski was an advisor to John F. Kennedy and later to the Lyndon B. Johnson administration.
ref: Throughout 1960s, Brzezinski worked for John F. Kennedy as his advisor and then the Lyndon B. Johnson administration.

src: Nel corso delle elezioni del 1976, consigliò Carter in materia di politica estera per poi ricoprire il ruolo di Consigliere per la sicurezza nazionale (NSA) dal 1977 al 1981, subentrando a Henry Kissinger.
mt: 1976, advised Carter on foreign policy and served as National Security Advisor (NSA) from 1977 to 1981, succeeding Henry Kissinger.
ref: During the 1976 selections he advised Carter on foreign policy, then served as National Security Advisor (NSA) from 1977 to 1981, succeeding Henry Kissinger.

src: In qualità di membro dell'NSA, ha collaborato con Carter alla gestione diplomatica degli affari internazionali, tra cui gli Accordi di Camp David del 1978, la normalizzazione dei rapporti tra Cina e Stati Uniti alla fine degli anni '70, la rivoluzione iraniana (che ha portato alla crisi degli ostaggi in Iran nel 1979) e l'invasione sovietica dell'Afghanistan nel 1979.
mt: As a member of the NSA, he worked with Carter on the diplomatic management of international affairs, including the 1978 Camp David Accords, the normalization of relations between China and the United States in the late 1970s, the Iranian Revolution (which led to the 1979 Iran hostage crisis), and the Soviet invasion of Afghanistan in 1979.
ref: As NSA, he assisted Carter in diplomatically handling world affairs, such as the Camp David Accords, 1978; normalizing US–China relations thought the late 1970s; the Iranian Revolution, which led to the Iran hostage crisis, 1979; and the Soviet invasion in Afghanistan, 1979.

src: Il film, interpretato da Ryan Gosling ed Emma Stone, ha collezionato candidature in tutte le categorie principali.
mt: The film, starring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone, has been nominated in all major categories.
ref: The movie, featuring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone, received nominations in all major categories.

src: Gosling e la Stone hanno avuto la nomination: miglior attore e miglior attrice rispettivamente.
mt: Gosling and Stone have been nominated: best actor and best actress respectively.
ref: Gosling and Stone received nominations for Best Actor and Actress respectively.

src: Le altre nomination includono miglior film, miglior regia, miglior fotografia, migliori costumi, miglior montaggio, migliore colonna sonora originale, migliore scenografia, miglior montaggio sonoro, miglior sonoro e migliore sceneggiatura originale.
mt: Other nominations include best picture, best director, best cinematography, best costume design, best film editing, best original score, best production design, best sound editing, best sound mixing and best original screenplay.
ref: The other nominations include Best Picture, Director, Cinematography, Costume Design, Film-editing, Original Score, Production Design, Sound Editing, Sound Mixing and Original Screenplay.

src: Due brani del film, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) e City of Stars, hanno avuto le nomination come migliore canzone originale. Lo studio con il maggior numero di nomination è stato Lionsgate, che ne ha ricevute 26.
mt: 2 songs from the film, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) and City of Stars, were nominated for best original song. The studio with the most nominations was Lionsgate, which received 26.
ref: Two songs from the movie, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) and City of Stars, received nominations for best original song. Lionsgate studio received 26 nominations — more than any other studio.

src: Nella serata di domenica, il presidente degli Stati Uniti Donald Trump, ha fornito una dichiarazione attraverso il suo addetto stampa, in cui annunciava il ritiro delle truppe americane dalla Siria.
mt: On Sunday evening, U.S. President Donald Trump issued a statement through his press secretary, announcing the withdrawal of American troops from Syria.
ref: Late on Sunday, the United States President Donald Trump, in a statement delivered via the press secretary, announced US troops would be leaving Syria.

src: L'annuncio è stato fatto a seguito di un colloquio telefonico tra Trump e il presidente turco Recep Tayyip Erdoğan.
mt: The announcement came after a phone call between Trump and Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan.
ref: The announcement was made after Trump had a phone conversation with Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan.

src: La Turchia, dice il comunicato, subentrerebbe anche nella custodia dei combattenti dell'ISIS prigionieri, che su rifiuto delle nazioni europee non sono stati rimpatriati.
mt: The statement said Turkey would also take custody of ISIS fighters who have been held in Europe but refused to be repatriated.
ref: Turkey would also take over guarding captured ISIS fighters which, the statement said, European nations have refused to repatriate.

src: Questo non solo conferma che alcuni dinosauri avevano le piume, una teoria già ampiamente diffusa, ma fornisce dettagli maggiori rispetto ai fossili, come il colore e l'arrangiamento tridimensionale.
mt: This not only confirms that some dinosaurs had feathers, a theory already widely accepted, but provides more details than fossils, such as color and three-dimensional arrangement.
ref: This not only confirms that at least some dinosaurs had feathers, a theory already widespread, but provides details fossils generally cannot, such as color and three-dimensional arrangement.

src: . Secondo quanto affermano gli scienziati, il piumaggio di questo animale era marrone castano nella parte superiore, con una colorazione pallida o carotenoide nella parte inferiore.
mt: . According to the scientists, the plumage of this animal was brown on top, with a pale or carotenoid coloration on the bottom.
ref: . Scientists say this animal's plumage was chestnut-brown on top with a pale or carotenoid-colored underside.

src: La scoperta permette inoltre di ottenere informazioni dettagliate in merito all'evoluzione delle piume degli uccelli.
mt: The discovery also allows for detailed information on the evolution of bird feathers.
ref: The find also grants insight into the evolution of feathers in birds.

src: Siccome il piumaggio del dinosauro non è dotato della struttura di base, il cosiddetto rachide, ma ha invece altre caratteristiche tipiche delle piume, barbe e barbule, i ricercatori hanno concluso che il rachide sia probabilmente il risultato di uno sviluppo evolutivo successivo a tali caratteristiche.
mt: Because the dinosaur's feathers lack the basic structure, the so-called "rachis", but instead have other characteristics typical of feathers, barbs and barbules, researchers concluded that the rachis is probably the result of a later evolutionary development of such characteristics.
ref: Because the dinosaur feathers do not have a well-developed shaft, called a rachis, but do have other features of feathers — barbs and barbules — the researchers inferred the rachis was likely a later evolutionary development that these other features.

src: La struttura del piumaggio fa pensare che non fosse utilizzato per il volo, ma piuttosto per la regolazione della temperatura o per il corteggiamento. I ricercatori ipotizzano che, pur trattandosi della coda di un giovane dinosauro, il reperto mostri un piumaggio da adulto e non il piumino da pulcino.
mt: The structure of the feathers suggests it was not used for flight, but rather for temperature regulation or courtship. Researchers hypothesize that, despite being the tail of a young dinosaur, the specimen shows adult feathers, not down.
ref: The feathers' structure suggests that they were not used in flight but rather for temperature regulation or display. The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.

src: Secondo le ipotesi dei ricercatori, nonostante la coda appartenga a un giovane dinosauro, il campione rivela un piumaggio da esemplare adulto e non quello di un pulcino.
mt: According to the researchers, despite the tail belonging to a young dinosaur, the specimen reveals adult plumage and not that of a chick.
ref: The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.

src: Un'autobomba è esplosa ieri mattina nella sede della polizia di Gaziantep, in Turchia, uccidendo due agenti e ferendo oltre venti persone.
mt: A car bomb exploded this morning at the police headquarters in Gaziantep, Turkey, killing two officers and injuring over twenty people.
ref: A car bomb detonated at police headquarters in Gaziantep, Turkey yesterday morning killed two police officers and injured more than twenty other people.

src: L'ufficio del governatore ha riferito che tra i feriti, diciannove erano agenti di polizia.
mt: 19 police officers were among the injured, according to the governor's office.
ref: The governor's office said nineteen of the injured were police officers.

src: La polizia ha riferito che il sospettato responsabile dell'attacco è un presunto militante di Daesh (ISIL).
mt: Police have reported that the suspected attacker is a suspected ISIL militant.
ref: Police said they suspect an alleged Daesh (ISIL) militant of responsibility for the attack.

src: Hanno scoperto che il funzionamento del Sole si fonda sugli stessi principi di base delle altre stelle: l'attività di tutte le stelle del sistema solare è determinata nient'altro che dalla loro luminosità e rotazione.
mt: They discovered that the Sun's operation is based on the same basic principles as other stars: the activity of all the stars in the solar system is determined by nothing other than their brightness and rotation.
ref: They found the Sun operated on the same basic principles as other stars: The activity of all stars in the system was found to be driven by their luminosity, their rotation, and nothing else.

src: La luminosità viene usata insieme alla rotazione per definire il numero di Rossby di una stella, che è legato al flusso di plasma.
mt: The brightness is used together with the rotation to define the Rossby number of a star, which is related to the plasma flow.
ref: The luminosity and rotation are used together to determine a star's Rossby number, which is related to plasma flow.

src: Più il numero di Rossby è basso, minore è l'attività della stella rispetto alle inversioni magnetiche.
mt: The lower the Rossby number, the less stellar activity there is during magnetic reversals.
ref: The smaller the Rossby number, the less active the star with respect to magnetic reversals.

src: Durante il suo viaggio, Iwasaki è finito nei guai in diverse occasioni.
mt: During his trip, Iwasaki got into trouble several times.
ref: During his trip, Iwasaki ran into trouble on many occasions.

src: Fu derubato dai pirati, attaccato da un cane rabbioso in Tibet, sfuggì al matrimonio in Nepal e fu arrestato in India.
mt: He was robbed by pirates, attacked by a rabid dog in Tibet, escaped a marriage in Nepal and was arrested in India.
ref: He was robbed by pirates, attacked in Tibet by a rabid dog, escaped marriage in Nepal and was arrested in India.

src: Lo standard 802.11n può operare sia nella banda dei 2.4Ghz che in quella dei 5.0Ghz.
mt: 802.11n can operate in both the 2.4GHz and 5.0GHz bands.
ref: The 802.11n standard operates on both the 2.4Ghz and 5.0Ghz frequencies.

src: Posto che la stazione base abbia doppie radio, questo gli consentirà di essere retrocompatibile con 802.11a, 802.11b e 802.11g.
mt: 802.11n is backwards compatible with 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g.
ref: This will allow it to be backwards compatible with 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g, provided that the base station has dual radios.

src: Le velocità 802.11n sono considerevolmente più elevate rispetto a quelle delle versioni precedenti, con un throughput massimo teorico di 600 Mbps.
mt: 802.11n speeds are considerably higher than previous versions, with a theoretical maximum throughput of 600 Mbps.
ref: The speeds of 802.11n are substantially faster than that of its predecessors with a maximum theoretical throughput of 600Mbit/s.

src: Duvall, sposato con due figli adulti, non ha destato un grande interesse in Miller, a cui ha raccontato la storia.
mt: Duvall, married with two adult children, did not arouse much interest in Miller, to whom he told the story.
ref: Duvall, who is married with two adult children, did not leave a big impression on Miller, to whom the story was related.

src: Alla richiesta di un commento, Miller ha risposto: "Mike parla molto durante l'udienza… Io mi stavo preparando per cui non ascoltavo quello che lui diceva".
mt: When asked for comment, Miller responded, "Mike talks a lot during the hearing... I was preparing myself so I wasn't listening to what he was saying."
ref: When asked for comment, Miller said, "Mike talks a lot during the hearing...I was getting ready so I wasn't really hearing what he was saying."

src: "Ci sforzeremo di tagliare le emissioni di diossido di carbonio per unità di PIL di un margine notevole entro il 2020, rispetto ai livelli del 2005", ha affermato Hu.
mt: "We will strive to reduce carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP by a significant margin by 2020, compared with 2005 levels," Hu said.
ref: "We will endeavour to cut carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP by a notable margin by 2020 from the 2005 level," Hu said.

src: Non ha stabilito un valore preciso della riduzione, affermando che essa dipenderà dalla produttività economica cinese.
mt: He did not give a specific value for the reduction, saying it would depend on China's economic productivity.
ref: He did not set a figure for the cuts, saying they will be made based on China's economic output.

src: Hu ha invitato i Paesi in via di sviluppo a "evitare la vecchia strada di inquinare prima e ripulire poi".
mt: Hu urged developing countries to "avoid the old path of polluting first and cleaning up later".
ref: Hu encouraged developing countries "to avoid the old path of polluting first and cleaning up later."

src: Ha anche aggiunto che non dovrebbero, comunque, essere costretti ad assumersi degli obblighi che trascendono la loro fase di sviluppo, come pure le loro responsabilità e competenze.
mt: It has also added that they should not, however, be forced to assume obligations that transcend their development phase, as well as their responsibilities and competences.
ref: He added that "they should not, however, be asked to take on obligations that go beyond their development stage, responsibility and capabilities."

src: Il gruppo di studio sull’Iraq ha presentato oggi alle 12.00 GMT la sua relazione.
mt: The Iraq Study Group presented its report at 12:00 GMT today.
ref: The Iraq Study Group presented its report at 12.00 GMT today.

src: Ammonisce: "Nessuno può garantire che qualsiasi azione in Iraq in questo momento fermerà le guerre settarie, la crescente violenza o una deriva verso il caos".
mt: "Nobody can guarantee that any action in Iraq at this moment will stop sectarian wars, growing violence or a drift towards chaos."
ref: It warns No one can guarantee that any course of action in Iraq at this point will stop sectarian warfare, growing violence, or a slide toward chaos.

src: Il rapporto inizia con un appello a un dibattito aperto e alla creazione di un consenso negli Stati Uniti circa la politica nei confronti del Medio Oriente.
mt: The report begins with an appeal for an open debate and the creation of a consensus in the United States about policy in the Middle East.
ref: The Report opens with plea for open debate and the formation of a consensus in the United States about the policy towards the Middle East.

src: Il rapporto è fortemente critico in merito a quasi tutti gli aspetti dell'attuale politica dell'Esecutivo nei confronti dell'Iraq ed esorta a un cambiamento immediato di direzione.
mt: The report is highly critical of almost every aspect of the government's current policy towards Iraq and urges an immediate change of direction.
ref: The Report is highly critical of almost every aspect of the present policy of the Executive towards Iraq and it urges an immediate change of direction.

src: La prima delle sue 78 raccomandazioni riguarda l'avvio di una nuova iniziativa diplomatica da intraprendere entro la fine di quest'anno con lo scopo di proteggere i confini dell'Iraq da azioni ostili e di riprendere i rapporti diplomatici con i suoi vicini.
mt: 1 of its 78 recommendations is to start a new diplomatic initiative to be undertaken by the end of this year to protect Iraq's borders from hostile actions and to resume diplomatic relations with its neighbors.
ref: First among its 78 recommendations is that a new diplomatic initiative should be taken before the end of this year to secure Iraq’s borders against hostile interventions and to re-establish diplomatic relations with its neighbors.

src: Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner, attuale senatrice e first lady argentina, ieri sera ha annunciato la sua candidatura presidenziale a La Plata, città che sorge a 50 chilometri (31 miglia) da Buenos Aires.
mt: Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner, current senator and first lady of Argentina, yesterday evening announced her presidential candidacy in La Plata, a city that lies 50 kilometers (31 miles) from Buenos Aires.
ref: Current senator and Argentine First Lady Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner announced her presidential candidacy yesterday evening in La Plata, a city 50 kilometers (31 miles) away from Buenos Aires.

src: La Kirchner ha scelto il Teatro Argentino per annunciare la sua intenzione di candidarsi per la presidenza, lo stesso luogo da cui nel 2005 aveva dato il via alla sua campagna elettorale per il Senato come membro della delegazione della provincia di Buenos Aires.
mt: Kirchner chose the Teatro Argentino to announce her intention to run for president, the same place from which in 2005 she had given the start to her electoral campaign for the Senate as a member of the Buenos Aires province delegation.
ref: Mrs. Kirchner announced her intention to run for president at the Argentine Theatre, the same location she used to start her 2005 campaign for the Senate as member of the Buenos Aires province delegation.

src: La discussione è stata scatenata da polemiche sulla spesa per gli aiuti e la ricostruzione in seguito all'uragano Katrina, che alcuni conservatori fiscali, scherzando, hanno etichettato come "il New Deal di Bush per New Orleans".
mt: The debate was sparked by criticism of the cost of aid and reconstruction following Hurricane Katrina, which some fiscal conservatives, jokingly, labeled as "Bush's New Deal for New Orleans".
ref: The debate was sparked by controversy over spending on relief and reconstruction in the wake Hurricane Katrina; which some fiscal conservatives have humorously labeled "Bush's New Orleans Deal."

src: La critica liberale nei confronti dell'impegno di ricostruzione si è focalizzata sull'assegnazione di contratti per la ricostruzione a insider di Washington riconosciuti.
mt: Liberal criticism of the reconstruction effort has focused on the awarding of contracts for reconstruction to Washington insiders.
ref: Liberal criticism of the reconstruction effort has focused on the awarding of reconstruction contracts to perceived Washington insiders.

src: Oltre quattro milioni di persone si sono recate a Roma per prendere parte ai funerali.
mt: 4 million people attended the funeral.
ref: Over four million people went to Rome to attend the funeral.

src: Le persone presenti erano talmente numerose che non è stato possibile per tutti avere accesso al funerale in piazza San Pietro.
mt: So many people were present that not everyone could gain access to the funeral in St. Peter's Square.
ref: The number of people present was so large that it was not possible for everybody to gain access to the funeral in St. Peter's Square.

src: In vari punti di Roma sono stati installati grandi schermi televisivi per permettere alla gente di assistere alla cerimonia.
mt: Large screens have been set up in various parts of Rome to allow people to watch the ceremony.
ref: Several large television screens were installed in various places in Rome to let the people watch the ceremony.

src: Allestimenti simili sono stati realizzati in molte altre città italiane e nel resto del mondo, specialmente in Polonia, e un gran numero di persone ha guardato l'evento attraverso di essi.
mt: Similar displays have been set up in many other Italian cities and around the world, especially in Poland, and a large number of people have watched the event through them.
ref: In many other cities of Italy and in the rest of the world, particularly in Poland, similar setups were made, which were viewed by a great number of people.

src: Gli storici criticano le politiche del passato dell’FBI sostenendo che abbia concentrato le risorse su casi facili da risolvere, in particolare i furti di auto, allo scopo di aumentare il tasso di successo dell’agenzia.
mt: Historians criticize the FBI's past policies, saying it has focused its resources on easy-to-solve cases, particularly car thefts, in order to increase the agency's success rate.
ref: Historians have criticized past FBI policies for focusing resources on cases which are easy to solve, especially stolen car cases, with the intent of boosting the agency's success rate.

src: L'iniziativa contro le oscenità è stata finanziata dal Congresso a partire dall'anno fiscale 2005, con la specifica richiesta all'FBI di assegnare 10 agenti alla pornografia per adulti.
mt: The initiative against obscenity was funded by Congress beginning in the 2005 fiscal year, with a specific request to the FBI to assign 10 agents to pornography for adults.
ref: Congress began funding the obscenity initiative in fiscal 2005 and specified that the FBI must devote 10 agents to adult pornography.

src: Robin Uthappa ha realizzato il punteggio più alto degli inning con 70 run in appena 41 palle, totalizzando 11 fours e 2 sixes.
mt: Robin Uthappa scored the highest score in an innings with 70 runs in just 41 balls, scoring 11 fours and 2 sixes.
ref: Robin Uthappa made the innings highest score, 70 runs in just 41 balls by hitting 11 fours and 2 sixes.

src: Sachin Tendulkar e Rahul Dravid, battitori di medio ordine, hanno giocato bene e hanno segnato in collaborazione cento run.
mt: Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid, middle-order batsmen, played well and scored a century in partnership.
ref: Middle order batsmen, Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid, performed well and made a hundred-run partnership.

src: Poi il capitano ha perso il suo wicket, e da quel momento fino alla fine degli inning l'India ha realizzato solo 36 run, perdendo 7 wicket.
mt: Then the captain lost his wicket, and from that point until the end of the innings India scored only 36 runs, losing 7 wickets.
ref: But, after losing the captain's wicket India only made 36 runs loosing 7 wickets to end the innings.

src: La mattina del 16 novembre il presidente americano George W. Bush è giunto a Singapore e ha dato inizio al suo soggiorno di una settimana in Asia.
mt: 16 November morning, American President George W. Bush arrived in Singapore and began his week-long stay in Asia.
ref: U.S. President George W. Bush arrived in Singapore the morning of November 16, beginning a week-long tour of Asia.

src: Ad accoglierlo c'erano il vice primo ministro di Singapore Wong Kan Seng e il primo ministro di Singapore Lee Hsien Loong, con il quale ha discusso di problematiche commerciali e legate al terrorismo.
mt: To greet him were Singapore's deputy prime minister Wong Kan Seng and Singapore's prime minister Lee Hsien Loong, with whom he discussed commercial and terrorism issues.
ref: He was greeted by Singapore's Deputy Prime Minister Wong Kan Seng and discussed trade and terrorism issues with the Singapore Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong.

src: Dopo una settimana di sconfitte nell'ambito delle consultazioni di metà mandato, Bush ha tenuto un discorso sullo sviluppo del commercio in Asia.
mt: After a week of setbacks in mid-term consultations, Bush held a speech on the development of trade in Asia.
ref: After a week of losses in the midterm election, Bush told an audience about the expansion of trade in Asia.

src: Dopo l'incontro di martedì durato 25 minuti con il leader dell'NDP Jack Layton nel PMO, il primo ministro Stephen Harper si è detto d'accordo a sottoporre il 'Clean Air Act' del governo al riesame di un comitato composto da tutte le parti in preparazione della seconda lettura.
mt: 25 minutes after meeting NDP leader Jack Layton in the PMO, Prime Minister Stephen Harper said he was willing to have the government's 'Clean Air Act' reviewed by a committee made up of all parties in preparation for the second reading.
ref: Prime Minister Stephen Harper has agreed to send the government's 'Clean Air Act' to an all-party committee for review, before its second reading, after Tuesday's 25 minute meeting with NDP leader Jack Layton at the PMO.

src: In occasione dell'incontro con il Primo Ministro, Layton aveva richiesto alcuni emendamenti al progetto di legge ambientale del Partito conservatore, sollecitandone una "riscrittura accurata e completa".
mt: Layton had requested some amendments to the Conservative Party's environmental bill at the meeting, asking for a "complete and thorough rewrite".
ref: Layton had asked for changes to the conservatives' environmental bill during the meeting with the PM, asking for a "thorough and complete rewriting" of the Conservative party's environmental bill.

src: Dacché il governo federale è intervenuto rilevando il finanziamento dell'ospedale Mersey di Devonport, in Tasmania, il governo statale e diversi deputati hanno criticato la misura come uno stratagemma preelettorale in vista delle consultazioni federali in calendario a novembre.
mt: Since the federal government took over funding of the Mersey Hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, the state government and several MPs have criticised the move as a pre-election ploy ahead of the federal election scheduled for November.
ref: Ever since the Federal Government stepped in to take over funding of the Mersey hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, the state government and some federal MPs have criticised this act as a stunt in the prelude to the federal election to be called by November.

src: Il primo ministro John Howard ha tuttavia dichiarato che l'obiettivo del gesto, grazie a una donazione extra di 45 milioni di dollari australiani, era solo quello di proteggere le strutture dell'ospedale dal declassamento ad opera del governo tasmano.
mt: Prime Minister John Howard, however, declared that the goal of the gesture, thanks to an extra donation of 45 million Australian dollars, was only to protect the hospital's facilities from downgrading by the Tasmanian government.
ref: But Prime Minister John Howard has said the act was only to safeguard the facilities of the hospital from being downgraded by the Tasmanian government, in giving an extra AUD$45 million.

src: Secondo l'ultimo bollettino, le letture del livello del mare hanno segnalato la generazione di uno tsunami. Vicino a Pago Pago e Niue è stata registrata un'attività riconducibile a quella di uno tsunami.
mt: According to the latest bulletin, sea level readings have indicated the generation of a tsunami. Near Pago Pago and Niue, activity was reported as being related to a tsunami.
ref: According to the latest bulletin, sea level readings indicated a tsunami was generated. There was some definite tsunami activity recorded near Pago Pago and Niue.

src: Non sono stati segnalati danni a cose o persone a Tonga, tuttavia è mancata temporaneamente la corrente elettrica e questo, stando a quanto riportato, non ha permesso alle autorità tongane di ricevere l'allerta tsunami dal PTWC.
mt: There were no reports of damage to people or property in Tonga, but power was briefly lost, according to reports, preventing Tongan authorities from receiving the tsunami warning from PTWC.
ref: No major damage or injuries have been reported in Tonga, but power was temporarily lost, which reportedly prevented Tongan authorities from receiving the tsunami warning issued by the PTWC.

src: Quattordici scuole delle Hawaii situate in prossimità dei litorali sono rimaste chiuse per tutta la giornata di mercoledì nonostante gli allarmi fossero rientrati.
mt: 14 Hawaii schools near the coast were closed all day Wednesday despite the all-clear.
ref: Fourteen schools in Hawaii located on or near coastlines were closed all of Wednesday despite the warnings being lifted.

src: L'annuncio è stato accolto favorevolmente dal presidente degli Stati Uniti George W. Bush.
mt: The announcement was welcomed by U.S. President George W. Bush.
ref: U.S. President George W. Bush welcomed the announcement.

src: Gordon Johndroe, portavoce di Bush, ha definito la promessa della Corea del Nord "un passo fondamentale verso la realizzazione dell'obiettivo della denuclearizzazione della penisola coreana".
mt: Gordon Johndroe, a Bush spokesman, called the North Korean promise "a significant step toward the goal of denuclearizing the Korean peninsula."
ref: Bush spokesman Gordon Johndroe called North Korea's pledge "a major step towards the goal of achieving the verifiable denuclearization of the Korean peninsula."

src: Nella giornata di oggi si è formata nell'Oceano Atlantico la decima tempesta della stagione degli uragani atlantici, il ciclone subtropicale Jerry.
mt: Today, the tenth tropical storm of the Atlantic hurricane season, subtropical storm Jerry, formed in the Atlantic Ocean.
ref: The tenth named storm of the Atlantic Hurricane season, Subtropical Storm Jerry, formed in the Atlantic Ocean today.

src: Secondo il National Hurricane Center (NHC), Jerry a questo punto non costituisce una minaccia per la terraferma.
mt: According to the National Hurricane Center (NHC), Jerry at this point does not pose a threat to land.
ref: The National Hurricane Center (NHC) says that at this point Jerry poses no threat to land.

src: Secondo una stima dell'USACE, 6 pollici di pioggia potrebbero rompere gli argini danneggiati in precedenza.
mt: 6 inches of rain could breach the damaged levees, according to an estimate by the USACE.
ref: The U.S. Corps of Engineers estimated that 6 inches of rainfall could breach the previously damaged levees.

src: Il Ninth Ward, dove l'uragano Katrina aveva provocato inondazioni alte fino a 20 piedi, in questo momento è quasi completamente sommerso poiché l'acqua ha superato l'argine vicino.
mt: 9th Ward, where Hurricane Katrina had caused flooding up to 20 feet high, is now almost completely submerged as the water has topped the levee nearby.
ref: The Ninth Ward, which saw flooding as high as 20 feet during Hurricane Katrina, is currently in waist-high water as the nearby levee was overtopped.

src: L'acqua tracima da una sezione dell'argine larga 100 piedi.
mt: 100-foot section of levee overtopped by water.
ref: Water is spilling over the levee in a section 100 feet wide.

src: L'amministratore di Commons Adam Cuerden ha manifestato la sua disapprovazione in merito alle cancellazioni durante la sua chiacchierata con Wikinews il mese scorso.
mt: Commons administrator Adam Cuerden expressed his disapproval of the deletions during his interview with Wikinews last month.
ref: Commons Administrator Adam Cuerden expressed his frustration over the deletions when he spoke to Wikinews last month.

src: "In sostanza [Wales] ci ha mentito sin dall'inizio. Innanzitutto, comportandosi come se fosse per motivi legali. In secondo luogo, fingendo di darci ascolto fino al momento della effettiva cancellazione delle opere da parte sua".
mt: "In essence [Wales] lied to us from the beginning. First, acting as if it was for legal reasons. Secondly, pretending to listen to us until the actual cancellation of the works by him".
ref: "He [Wales] basically lied to us from the start. First, by acting as if this was for legal reasons. Second, by pretending he was listening to us, right up to his art deletion."

src: A seguito del disagio della comunità sono stati fatti sforzi per redigere una politica relativa ai contenuti sessuali sul sito, che ospita milioni di contenuti multimediali con licenza aperta.
mt: In response to the community's concerns, efforts were made to draft a policy regarding sexual content on the site, which hosts millions of multimedia content with open license.
ref: The community irritation led to current efforts to draft a policy regarding sexual content for the site which hosts millions of openly-licensed media.

src: L'attività svolta è stata per lo più teorica, ma il programma è stato scritto per simulare i rilievi effettuati della galassia del Sagittario.
mt: The work was mostly theoretical, but the program was written to simulate the observations made of the Sagittarius galaxy.
ref: The work done was mostly theoretical, but the program was written to simulate observations made of the Sagittarius galaxy.

src: L'effetto cercato dal team doveva essere provocato dalle forze mareali tra la materia oscura di questa galassia e la materia oscura della Via Lattea.
mt: The effect sought by the team was to be caused by tidal forces between the dark matter of this galaxy and the dark matter of the Milky Way.
ref: The effect the team was looking for would be caused by tidal forces between the galaxy's dark matter and the Milky Way's dark matter.

src: Così come la Luna esercita una forza di attrazione sulla Terra che genera le maree, anche la Via Lattea esercita una forza sulla galassia del Sagittario.
mt: As the Moon exerts a force of attraction on the Earth that generates tides, so too does the Milky Way exert a force on the Sagittarius galaxy.
ref: Just like the moon exerts a pull on the earth, causing tides, so does the Milky Way exert a force on the Sagittarius galaxy.

src: Gli scienziati hanno potuto desumere che gli effetti della materia oscura su altra materia oscura sono gli stessi effetti che ha la materia "normale".
mt: The scientists were able to deduce that the effects of dark matter on other dark matter are the same effects that normal matter has.
ref: The scientists were able to conclude that the dark matter affect other dark matter in the same way regular matter does.

src: Questa teoria sostiene che gran parte della materia oscura intorno a una galassia è raccolta in una specie di alone, formato da una moltitudine di piccole particelle.
mt: This theory suggests that most of the dark matter around a galaxy is collected in a kind of halo, formed by a multitude of small particles.
ref: This theory says that most dark matter around a galaxy is located around a galaxy in a kind of halo, and is made of lots of small particles.

src: I reportage televisivi mostrano il fumo bianco che fuoriesce dall'impianto.
mt: Television reports show white smoke coming from the facility.
ref: Television reports show white smoke coming from the plant.

src: Le autorità locali stanno allertando le persone residenti nei pressi della centrale a rimanere in casa, a spegnere i condizionatori e a non bere l'acqua del rubinetto.
mt: Local authorities are warning residents near the plant to stay indoors, turn off air conditioners and not drink tap water.
ref: Local authorities are warning residents in the vicinity of the plant to stay indoors, turn off air-conditioners and not to drink tap water.

src: In base alle dichiarazioni dell'agenzia nucleare del Giappone, sono stati rilevati cesio e iodio radioattivi presso l'impianto.
mt: According to the Japan Atomic Energy Agency, radioactive cesium and iodine were detected at the plant.
ref: According to Japan's nuclear agency, radioactive caesium and iodine has been identified at the plant.

src: L'ipotesi delle autorità è che questo indichi una rottura e una conseguente perdita dei contenitori di combustibile all'uranio nel sito.
mt: Authorities believe this indicates a breach and subsequent loss of fuel containers at uranium site.
ref: Authorities speculate that this indicates that containers holding uranium fuel at the site may have ruptured and are leaking.

src: Il dottor Tony Moll ha individuato la tubercolosi estensivamente resistente ai farmaci (XDR-TB) nella provincia sudafricana di KwaZulu-Natal.
mt: Dr. Tony Moll has identified extensively drug-resistant tuberculosis (XDR-TB) in the South African province of KwaZulu-Natal.
ref: Dr. Tony Moll discovered the Extremely Drug Resistant Tuberculosis (XDR-TB) in the South African region KwaZulu-Natal.

src: Secondo una dichiarazione rilasciata in un'intervista, questa nuova variante era "altamente preoccupante e allarmante, per via dell’elevato tasso di mortalità".
mt: In a statement released in an interview, this new variant was "highly concerning and alarming, due to the high mortality rate".
ref: In an interview, he said the new variant was "very highly troubling and alarming because of the very high fatality rate."

src: Secondo il dottor Moll alcuni pazienti potrebbero aver contratto il microbo all'interno dell'ospedale, e almeno due di essi erano operatori sanitari dell'ospedale stesso.
mt: Dr. Moll said some patients may have contracted the microbe inside the hospital, and at least two were hospital workers.
ref: Some patients might have contracted the bug in the hospital, Dr. Moll thinks, and at least two were hospital health workers.
